SOCIAL PREVIEW TEMPLATE (1280x640)
===================================

Use this as a layout reference for creating the actual image.

SPECIFICATIONS:
- Dimensions: 1280px × 640px (2:1 ratio)
- Format: PNG with transparency (or solid dark background)
- Background: Dark gradient (#0a0e27 → #1a1f3a) or solid (#0d1117)

TEXT LAYOUT:

1. Title "Devscope"
   - Position: Center-top (320px from top)
   - Font: Bold sans-serif, ~120px
   - Color: #58a6ff (GitHub blue) or #ffffff

2. Subtitle "Universal Codebase Intelligence"
   - Position: Below title (420px from top)
   - Font: Regular sans-serif, ~48px
   - Color: #c9d1d9 (light gray)

3. Sample Output Box
   - Position: Center-bottom (480px from top)
   - Content: "Devscope: B · Low risk · Easy onboarding · 0.06s ⚡"
   - Font: Monospace, ~38px
   - Color: #79c0ff (light blue)
   - Background: Semi-transparent box (#1a1f3a with 60% opacity)
   - Padding: 20px
   - Border-radius: 8px

OPTIONAL ENHANCEMENTS:
- Subtle grid pattern in background
- Gradient accent line at bottom (2px, #58a6ff)
- GitHub icon or code bracket icon (top-left, subtle)
- Soft glow effect on text for depth

DESIGN TOOL RECOMMENDATIONS:

1. Figma (Free, Web-based)
   - Create 1280x640 frame
   - Use text layers for content
   - Export as PNG

2. Canva (Free templates)
   - Search "GitHub social media"
   - Customize with devscope content
   - Download as PNG

3. Photopea (Free, like Photoshop)
   - Create new image 1280x640
   - Add layers for text/shapes
   - Export as PNG

UPLOAD INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Go to: https://github.com/EhsanAzish80/devscope/settings
2. Scroll to "Social preview"
3. Click "Upload an image"
4. Select your 1280x640 PNG file
5. Preview will show how it appears in social shares

The image will appear when the repo is shared on:
- Twitter/X
- Discord
- Slack
- LinkedIn
- Reddit
- Google search results
